headline: Hawai'i Supreme Court Addresses Insurance And Climate Change Litigation: "Occurrence" Requirement Met, But Pollution Exclusion Applies To Greenhouse Gases
summary: In Aloha Petroleum Ltd. v. National Union Fire Insurance Company of Pittsburgh ,> the Supreme Court of Hawai'i held that, while the climate change litigation satisfied the occurrence requirement,...
